{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Arkemyr's Notes
| icon           = poe2 book_paper icon.png
| description    = What help these imps offer is hardly worth the trouble of enduring their company. Yesterday I tried on a different face and my butler nearly sounded the alarm. It was some comfort that he recognized my robes.

I gave the chittering fools a passphrase to avoid this unpleasantness in the future - cider and cheese. Simple enough for an imp to recall.
